name: Wilder Hunters Forest 3D
description:
Wilder Hunters Forest 3D is an open world deer hunting game. The story of the game is very exciting where the user to perform the role of a skilled hunter where the hunter has to feed his/her money and sell other thing associated with dear. The hunter has to make a living out of hunting several wild animals there are multiple types of dear in the woods and the hunter has to silently move and keep a decent amount of distance to make sure that the pray never gets away.
World’s most advanced sniper with accurate scope focus and magazine.
Realistic 3D environment of beautiful woodland.
Ultra High definition (HD) display.
Smooth controllers.
Mission based gameplay to complete all missions.
Efficient processing with maximum FPS.
Detailed controllers.
